titles.title: Commercial Flight Courtesy Act of 2017
A bill to prohibit cell phone voice communications during passenger flights.
Commercial Flight Courtesy Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Commercial Flight Courtesy Act of 2017
This bill requires the Department of Transportation (DOT) to issue regulations prohibiting an individual on an aircraft from engaging in voice communications using a mobile device during a flight in scheduled passenger interstate or intrastate air transportation. DOT must exempt from the prohibition: (1) members of the flight crew on duty on an aircraft, and (2) federal law enforcement officers acting in an official capacity.
